debtDecay().notice: amount to decay total debt by

debtRatio().notice: calculate current ratio of debt to payout token supplyprotocols using Olympus Pro should be careful when quickly adding large %s to total supply

payoutFor(uint256).notice: calculate user's interest due for new bond

pendingPayoutFor(address).notice: calculate amount of payout token available for claim by depositor

percentVestedFor(address).notice: calculate how far into vesting a depositor is

trueBondPrice().notice: calculate true bond price a user pays
